name: Disadventure
description:
A game made in 2020 for Weekly Game Jam #180.  The theme is "downgrade."

Music is Elegy by Asher Fulero.  https://asherfulero.bandcamp.com/

All images were made using ArtBreeder.  https://artbreeder.com/browse

Typeface is Friz Quadrata.  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Friz_Quadrata
